topics.body:
Continuing to play fate/extra something hit me; is it weird that five hundred years ago mythological creatures like kitsune the reaction by people was:
"Oh no, please don't let them be real!  I don't want to be seduced by one!"
And now modern day the reaction by people is:
"Oh no, I wish they were real!  I would want to be seduced by one!"


No seriously, think about it for a second mythological creatures were originally meant to scare the living shit out of people, but now people wish they were real so they could bang them.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
